website_summaries.verdict: A part of Keen’s lifestyle footwear lineup, the Keen Elsa II Waterproof Chelsea pleased a lot of people because of its cute style. It is considered an excellent cleat for walking in the rain and light snow.Though the rounded toe box allowed for toe splaying, it was deemed too clunky-looking by others. But overall, this sneaker was generally well-received because of the comfort it offered.
pros: A majority of owners lauded the comfort offered by the Keen Elsa II Waterproof Chelsea during long periods of walking in wet and cold conditions
The Chelsea style was deemed fashionable by numerous shoppers
The fact that the cleat was easy to put on or remove resonated well with many wearers
Plenty of users who bought their usual size claimed that it was true to size
The rounded toe box offered the right amount of wiggle room for the toes, others noted
The rubber outsole provided excellent traction while walking on wet surfaces, said a lot of reviewers
Though the interior lining was not thick, multiple folks were satisfied with how this pair of Keen shoes kept their feet warm
Several purchasers were pleased with the arch support in this model
cons: A significant number of critics described the Elsa II Waterproof Chelsea from Keen as clunky
According to a minority of consumers, the heel of the footwear was too wide and caused the hindfoot to slip
Although it fits true to size, several testers had to return their purchase because the opening was too narrow
Some buyers were not fans of the rubber outsole because it squeaked on wood or vinyl floors

customer_reviews.title: Not a great fit
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted these boots to work but unlike other Keen’s the sole was flat, my foot slipped around inside and they felt more like inexpensive rain boots. Not even really thick socks made a difference. I ordered my usual size in Keens a 9. I don’t think they’d be any better a size smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Practical yet stylish booties
customer_reviews.text: I've owned several pairs of Keen shoes, so I had high expectations for these booties. My expectations were met for the most part. Great color, well-made, comfortable, sturdy sole. However, these boots are really difficult to slide on the first time! Therefore, I gave them four stars rather than five. After wearing them a couple of times, they've loosened up a bit and are easier to get on. I suppose this is why zippers on boots are handy - much easier to get on and off!
customer_reviews.author: Kara L Schroeder

customer_reviews.title: Rather large.
customer_reviews.text: Love Keene, but these were a disappointment and will send back. Way too large for the size and even with thick socks. Order your normal size or size down a half size.
customer_reviews.author: Weimie

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: I have had these in my wishlist for some time. They went to a price I couldn’t so no too. I love these boots. The wider toe is amazing and I love that I can just slip them on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots. This is the second pair I have bought. So comfy and warm. And my feet stay dry.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Run wide, otherwise a nice shoe
customer_reviews.text: I loved how these are low profile and still very functional. Returned because they ran wide (I wear a regular size 7) but that is not unusual in my experience with Keen shoes. Did not try them in snow, obviously, but they looked waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: no arch ....
customer_reviews.text: THEY WERE VERY FLAT,HARD AND NO ARCH SUPPORT! i have worn Keen's for over 20 years and loved them. this the second new design i've returned for the same reason. WHY ARE THEY CHANGING SOMETHING SO GREAT THAT WORKS??? SO DISAPPOINTED!
customer_reviews.author: beverly thome

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and well made
customer_reviews.text: Love all my Keen's and this boot is no exception. Comfortable, well made and actually stylish.
customer_reviews.author: AwakeNOW

customer_reviews.title: New favorite shoe
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these shoes. My go-to's slip on, waterproof, comfortable, cute. I'm buying a second pair!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great everyday boot!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these boots. Wore them all day with no “aches and pains”. Lots of compliments! Came faster than expected!
customer_reviews.author: clint venhuizen

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable and very fashionable!
customer_reviews.text: Love how these boots fit, considering another pair in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Cain

customer_reviews.title: Keen Boots
customer_reviews.text: They were exactly as stated. Boots are very warm and look good with jeans. Delivery fast.
customer_reviews.author: Joann Young

customer_reviews.title: Awkward
customer_reviews.text: My socks slip off my feet when walking in these shoes for any significant distance. It’s really awkward and unpleasant. I’ve tried different socks too.
customer_reviews.author: Loretta Pyles

product_meta.title: Keen Women's Elsa II Chelsea Waterproof
product_meta.description:
* Keep warm and comfortable while exploring both the city streets and the country trails with the KEEN® Elsa II Chelsea Waterproof boot.
 * Waterproof premium full grain leather upper.
 * Created with environmentally-preferred premium leather from LWG-certified tanneries.
   
 * Pull-on winter boot with printed side gore panels for easy on and off. 
 * Seam-sealed waterproof protection keeps outs the wet while providing a drier, more comfortable foot environment. 
 * 200g KEEN.Warm™ insulation provides a warm and cozy foot environment.
 * Interior treated with Cleansport NXT™ for natural odor control for a fresher foot environment. 
   
 * Breathable mesh lining. 
 * Vulcanized construction for long-lasting durability. 
 * Removable, fleece-wrapped PU footbed offers excellent underfoot cushioned comfort and added warmth. 
   
 * Heat-reflecting strobel provides a thermal barrier for warmth.
 * Non-marking rubber outsole. 
 * Temp rated: -4ºF / -20ºC. 
 * Imported.
 * Measurements:  *  Weight: 1 lb 1 oz
    *  Circumference: 10 in
    *  Shaft: 5 3⁄4 in
   
   
 * Product measurements were taken using size 8.5, width B - Medium. Please note that measurements may vary by size.
 * Weight of footwear is based on a single item, not a pair.
